title: Spotter Naki
paragraph: The Spotter Naki has the unique ability to scout enemy fields. A Spotter Naki is very adaptable and can be recruited on every field who has a local skill tree.

dynamicContents.content: The Spotter Naki is not made for fights and therefore have no effective or ineffective units. He prefers to stay in safe distance and spotting them. And this is the reason every island should have some Spotter Nakis. You can send espionage attacks to know how many units are on an unclaimed field or how strong an opponent is. And you can also protect your fields from getting spied. More on that on the next chapter.

A great benefit of Spotter Nakis are, that they can be produced on every field with a local skill tree. And very fast too. This means you are able to recruit Spotter Nakis everywhere in every stage of the game.

As the Spotter Nakis don't like fighting, they die really fast when getting attacked. To have the value out of Spotter Nakis, you will need more than the enemy has (see the espionage mechanic in the next chapter). But producing Spotter Nakis always reduce your other unit or soulstone production.
